entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
